name: Cover ME (sadus91)
description:
You are robot and have the mission to cover the green guy and bring him to the escape gate. 

Make sure you're not killed by the guards and the towers. You have to reach the white blinking cube on the last tower after the first 4 towers. There are 5 towers in total.

If the green guy got hit 3 times or if you die your mission will fail.

The restart when you die.

  • Use keyboard "G" to ask the green guy to follow you
  • Use keyboard "H" to ask the green guy to wait ( to not move)

Click "Tab" key to see all the controls.

How did you use Houdini to make your game?

the map and terrain is generate in houdini as long the scartted rock and pillow, and the bridge generator.

List everything that was made before the jam. Pre-built, assets, textures, etc

Character Interaction from the marketplace

Advance locomotion system from the marketplace

For the juge
